ygData.subject: Router problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone have experience with this problem: If I switch to another zone I get kicked of the server and the games tries to connect to the login server again,
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone have experience with this problem:

If I switch to another zone I get kicked of the server and the games tries
to connect to the login server again, which also fails. If I want to login to
everquest again I have to reboot/disconnect my router, then I can login
_one_ time and play one zone before I have to reboot the router again.
I play lots of other games through my router, but maybe it's slightly
misconfigured. It's an Intel 8100. Please help this is getting a bit annoying.

Salute,
Harfliick
Human Ranger, Level 3.
